en.title: The Hundred-Knot Bamboo
en.description: A Vietnamese folktale about perseverance and justice.
content: Once upon a time, there was a poor but hardworking young man who worked for a rich landowner.
The landowner promised to give him his daughter's hand in marriage if he worked hard.
However, when the time came, the landowner went back on his word and tricked the young man.
With the help of a kind magician, the young man obtained a magical bamboo with a hundred knots.
He used the magic to teach the greedy landowner a lesson and finally married the girl he loved.
